header.name: Matias
header.description: I like to design and create

profile.title: Profile
profile.introduction: Hello! My name is Matias. I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
profile.text_1: I started back in 2021 as a self-taught learner, as a way to explore and combine my two passions, computing and design.
profile.text_2: After 2 years of being self-taught, I knew which path I wanted to follow and dedicate myself to, so I decided to start university with the goal of becoming a professional.
profile.text_3: Currently, I work in the field of web development, specializing in Frontend.
profile.text_4: I am also in the process of learning and deepening my knowledge in the development of web and desktop applications to expand my skills in these technologies.
profile.text_5: Would you like to know what I have been up to lately? :D
